Package academy.mindswap.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Class representing the game logic. It manages the information between players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Game constructor that initializes playerconnections arraylist and fixedthreadpool.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Broadcasts the information for the players to initializes their own boards. Indicates players that the game begins. Initializes the variables isGameStarted and isFirstTurn. Creates the winning conditions (to be checked later on).

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Chooses the first playing player. Starts the mechanism to change player each turn. Broadcasts the name of the player that will play in each turn. Indicates the player that it's his/her turn. Receives and saves each play from player. Updates internal game state and sends it to the players via broadcast. Checks if there is any winner.

    • sendGameState

      private void sendGameState(String playerMove, StringBuilder gameStateToSend)
      Sends the game state to the players after updating the internal one.
      Parameters:
      playerMove - String containing the player move.
      gameStateToSend - String containing the updated game state to send.

    • switchPlayer

      private Game.PlayerHandler switchPlayer(Game.PlayerHandler previousPlayer)
      Decides the next player by knowing the previous one.
      Parameters:
      previousPlayer -
      Returns:

    • updateGameState

      private void updateGameState(Game.PlayerHandler playerTurn, String playerMove)
      Updates the internal game state, to send to the players.
      Parameters:
      playerTurn - Player that played.
      playerMove - The move that was played.

    • chooseStartingPlayer

      private Game.PlayerHandler chooseStartingPlayer()
      Chooses the starting player randomly. It assigns the first player to the starting symbol and second player to the other one. Broadcasts the name of the player that will start. Indicates the first player that it's his/her turn. Terminates the game if the second player disconnects.
      Returns:
      first player.

    • checkWinner

      private void checkWinner(Game.PlayerHandler playerTurn)
      Checks if the player has a winning condition in his playerMoves. If all positions of the board are filled, it broadcasts a message indicating a DRAW.
      Parameters:
      playerTurn - Player that played.

    • createWinningConditions

      private void createWinningConditions()
      Creates winning conditions and saves them in the winningConditions arrayList.

    • broadcast

      private void broadcast(String message)
      Broadcasts the message to all players.
      Parameters:
      message - String to send.

    • broadcast

      private void broadcast(String message, Game.PlayerHandler notSending)
      Broadcasts the message to all players, except a selected one.
      Parameters:
      message - String to send.
      notSending - Player that does not receive the message.

    • acceptPlayer

      public void acceptPlayer(Socket playerSocket)
      Adds to the threadpool a new player handler.
      Parameters:
      playerSocket - connection between server and player.

    • isAcceptingPlayers

      private boolean isAcceptingPlayers()
      Checks if the game can accept more players and
      Returns:
      true or false.

    • canGameStart

      public boolean canGameStart()
      Check if all necessary players are connected and verifies if each player has nicknames.
      Returns:
      true or false.

    • finishGame

      public void finishGame(int delay)
      Close all player connections and finishes the game.
      Parameters:
      delay -

    • isGameFinished

      public boolean isGameFinished()
      Gives the information if the game is finished.
      Returns:
      true or false.

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Gives the information if the game is finished.
      Returns:
      true or false.
